declarations.description: Container for displaying a slideshow of content sequentially.
declarations.name: WebwriterSlides

slots.description: Slide elements to be displayed (should be `webwriter-slide` components only).
slots.name: default

members.name: _handleKeyDown
members.description:
Handles keyboard navigation for the slideshow.
ArrowRight advances to the next slide, ArrowLeft goes back.
Only possible in preview mode.

members.name: activeSlideIndex
members.description: Index of the currently active slide.

members.name: activeSlide
members.description: The active slide element based on the activeSlideIndex.

members.name: lastDraggedOver
members.description: Index of the slide currently being dragged over (for drag-and-drop functionality).

members.name: isFullscreen
members.description: Whether the slideshow is currently displayed in fullscreen mode.

members.name: iconSrc
members.description: Icon source URL depending on fullscreen state (enter/exit).

members.name: slides
members.description:
All `webwriter-slide` elements. 
Represents the individual slides in the slideshow.

members.name: type
members.description:
Defines the type of view for the slideshow.
- "slides": Show content as sequential slides.
- "tabs": Show content using tabs.

members.name: addSlide
members.description: Add a new empty slide element. Optionally insert after given index.

members.name: duplicateSlide
members.description: Duplicate an existing slide at given index.

members.name: removeActiveSlide
members.description: Remove the currently active slide element.

members.name: removeSlide
members.description: Remove the currently active slide element.

members.name: nextSlide
members.description: Activate the next slide element.

members.name: hasNextSlide
members.description: False if slideshow is on the last slide.

members.name: hasPreviousSlide
members.description: False if slideshow is on the first slide.

members.name: handleNextSlideClick

parameters.name: e
parameters.description: The triggering mouse or keyboard event.

parameters.name: backwards
parameters.description: Whether to navigate backward (default is false).

members.description:
Handles navigation to the next or previous slide based on user input.
- Shift key: jump by the total number of slides.
- Ctrl key: jump by 10 slides.
- Otherwise: move by one slide.

members.name: changeSlide
members.description:
Changes the active slide to the specified index.
Waits for rendering to finish, scrolls the active slide into view,
and generates a thumbnail preview using snapdom.

parameters.description: The index of the slide to activate.
parameters.name: index

members.name: onDragStart

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the slide being dragged.

members.description:
Starts dragging a slide element.
Adds the 'dragging' CSS class and sets drag data.

members.name: onDragEnd
members.description:
Ends dragging a slide.
Moves the dragged slide to its new position if it was moved,
updates the active slide index, and cleans up drag state.

members.name: onDragOver

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the slide being dragged over.

members.description:
Handles dragging over a slide element.
Prevents default to allow dropping and records the slide index being hovered.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Defines the type of view for the slideshow.
- "slides": Show content as sequential slides.
- "tabs": Show content using tabs.

declarations.description: Represents a single slide in the `webwriter-slides` widget.
declarations.name: WebwriterSlide

slots.description: The content displayed within the slide.
slots.name: default

members.name: active
members.description: Indicates whether the slide is currently active/visible.

members.name: thumbnail
members.description:
Data URI string for the slide thumbnail (e.g., "data:image/png;base64,..."). 
Used to display a preview image for the slide.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Indicates whether the slide is currently active/visible.

attributes.name: thumbnail
attributes.description:
Data URI string for the slide thumbnail (e.g., "data:image/png;base64,..."). 
Used to display a preview image for the slide.
